properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 11 at 8:35PM CST until February 12 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls SD
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one
inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph and wind chills as low
as 25 below.

* WHERE...Portions of central, east central, south central and
southeast South Dakota, northeast Nebraska, northwest and west
central Iowa and southwest Minnesota.

* WHEN...From 9 AM to 6 PM CST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous
conditions could impact the evening commute. The cold wind
chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on
exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 6 PM CST WEDNESDAY
